posts.post_content:
I realize this is not the most popular of the T sets but I've been working on this off and on for a couple of years now and finally pushed my want list to single digits.  I would like to try and finish this set off in 2014-15 but I need the following 8 cards:

A Home Run
A White Wash
A Tie Game
Out
Put Out On 1st
Right Over The Plate
Strike One
The Red Sox

I'm also looking to upgrade a couple of the other cards so if you have cards from this set that are not on the list I'd be interested in those as well.
Bump to update want list.  Is anybody else working on this set and looking to trade?  I have a few extras.
End of the year bump.  Still need these 8.  I have extras to trade including Winners Cut Plug backed cards. Let me know if you have any of the cards listed above.
